attributes.action: Provide free cheese (cheddar or wensleydale) every Tuesday afternoon to everyone in the country with the first name Dave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People called Dave are special. Sharing a name with so many others forces one to be a little exceptional. As a reward, I propose free cheese to be provided at government expense to everyone called Dave, every Tuesday afternoon, in time for afternoon tea. Crackers are optional.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
